alert.note: Alert for Elbert; Franklin; Habersham; Hart; Stephens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued March 03 at 6:04PM EST until March 03 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 63 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM EST THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST GEORGIA ELBERT FRANKLIN HABERSHAM HART STEPHENS IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 12 COUNTIES IN PIEDMONT NORTH CAROLINA CLEVELAND IN WESTERN NORTH CAROLINA AVERY BUNCOMBE BURKE CALDWELL HENDERSON MCDOWELL MITCHELL POLK RUTHERFORD TRANSYLVANIA YANCEY IN SOUTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 10 COUNTIES IN UPSTATE SOUTH CAROLINA ABBEVILLE ANDERSON CHEROKEE GREENVILLE GREENWOOD LAURENS OCONEE PICKENS SPARTANBURG UNION SC THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABBEVILLE, ANDERSON, ASHEVILLE, ASHFORD, BALDWIN, BANNER ELK, BEREA, BLACK MOUNTAIN, BOYDVILLE, BREVARD, BURNSVILLE, BUSICK, CALHOUN FALLS, CANDLER, CANON, CEDAR MOUNTAIN, CELO, CLARKESVILLE, CLEMSON, CLINTON, COLUMBUS, CORNELIA, DACUSVILLE, DANA, DEMOREST, DYSARTSVILLE, EASLEY, EAST FLAT ROCK, ELBERTON, ETOWAH, FERO, FLETCHER, FOREST CITY, FORK SHOALS, FORTSONIA, FRANKLIN SPRINGS, GAFFNEY, GLENWOOD, GRANITE FALLS, GREENVILLE, GREER, GUMLOG, HARTWELL, HENDERSONVILLE, HOLLYWOOD, INGALLS, KINGS CREEK, KINGS MOUNTAIN, LAURENS, LAVONIA, LENOIR, LITTLE RIVER, MARION, MAULDIN, MICAVILLE, MIDDLETON, MILL SPRING, MONARCH MILLS, MORGANTON, MOUNTAIN REST, NEBO, NEWLAND, NINETY SIX, NUBERG, OAKWAY, PATTERSON, PLEASANT GROVE, POPLAR, RAMSEYTOWN, REED CREEK, ROYSTON, RUCKERSVILLE, RUTHERFORDTON, SALUDA, SAWMILLS, SENECA, SHELBY, SIMPSONVILLE, SPARTANBURG, SPINDALE, SPRUCE PINE, SUGAR HILL, SWISS, TAYLORS, TOCCOA, TRYON, TUXEDO, UNION, VALDESE, WALHALLA, WARE SHOALS, AND WESTMINSTER.
